----

This problem looks like this ...
```{r}
df <- read.csv("data/no-header.csv")
str(df)
df
```

If you used `read.csv()`, then this problem usually occurs if you have not included a header row on your CSV file.  See how to construct an external CSV file in [this FAQ](enter-data.html).
